Events that occurred on 7 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1908 - Voice actor Valentine Dyall is born.
1931 - Gene Wolfe is born.
1969 - Producer Rick Porras is born.
2009 - Cinematic Scripture: The Structure and Usage of The Lord of the Rings as Equipment for Living is published.

content.title: In Arda
